channel.title: Alternatives to Outcome on Outcome documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Alternatives to Outcome on Outcome documentation

item.title: C++ exception throws
item.description: (Note that we assume a table-based EH implementation here, a SJLJ EH implementaton would be a lot more even with Outcome. Table-based EH implementations are almost universal on x64, ARM and AArch64 targets) Pros: Zero runtime overhead on the happy path. Cons: Unpredictable runtime overhead on the sad path.
